QuestData.Title: Search and Rescue!
QuestData.Description: We've got to find Brambley before it's too late!$b$bOl' Brambley an' I have been fightin' side by side since the Third War. When the Burnin' Legion invaded, we didn't think twice about coming to the Broken Isles.$b$bFightin' is what we do best!$b$bDuring the battle ol' Brambley got caught too deep an' got himself captured. Now we've got to rescue him!$b$bLast I saw, the demons were keeping him in a prison cell not far from here... let's go!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found the key yet?
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to finally be free from this dreadful cage. As thanks, I will keep my word to you and your grotesquely hairy friend.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Halls of the Eclipse
